short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Choose an image to create an overlay for tracing in your web-based drawing or sketching apps.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Image Tracer Overlay is designed to simplify the tracing process in web-based drawing apps or games. Tracing means transferring an image into line work from a photo or artwork. With this extension, you can upload an image, rotate, zoom, and reposition it for alignment. 

Does not include drawing functionality!

Icon made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com

This extension is open source: https://github.com/samueleiche/image-tracer-chrome-extension
